column4: how do i turn off this desktop type find feature.  i can't type in a password for a game because of it.
sounds like the problem is that the game isn't grabbing keyboard focus
yeah it's not for some reason
is it wine?
yeah GW under wine
If you run winecfg and set a virtual desktop, it should get the keyboard focus, but then you can't play it in fullscreen :/
i'll just remove tracker, i never use it anyways
hehe, me neither, though I suspect it's not tracker, but rather nautilus that gets the keyboard focus
so is that nautilus doing the little search box?
Yes.
know how to disable it by any chance?
I doubt disabling it will make it work any better ...
it will alow me to type in my password! =)
No, because you are getting that search box because gw isn't grabbing the focus
right, but if i disable it i won't have to worry about it
well, if it's possible to disable it, you should find it under /apps/nautilus/ in «gconf-editor»
yeah looking there now
btw, try "Allow DirectX apps to stop the mouse leaving their window" in winecfg
k thanks
i think i found my problem, i had allow wm to control the window unchecked
Ah, that also sounds like a possible fix, indeed
yeah that was it =)
